con:soapui-project.name: Mantis

con:resource.name: Detach a tag from an issue

con:testSuite.name: Usuarios

con:config.script:
import groovy.sql.Sql import java.io.File
def con = Sql.newInstance("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/bugtracker?allowMultiQueries=true", "root", "root","com.mysql.jdbc.Driver" ) con.execute(sql) def lista = con.rows(" select * from mantis_user_table;")
log.info(lista.id[1].toString()) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue ("idUsuario", lista.id[1].toString())
con.close()
